item.title: Things to do After Purchasing a Domain
item.description: Yesterday, I purchased a new domain from Namecheap and realized there were a bunch of things to do to make the new webpage live. Here I listed some notes for future reference. Setup HTTPS For certain domain suffixes, HTTPS is compulsory. For instance, .dev is a secure namespace and the website requires HTTPS to work in browser. - Generate a new cert using certbot 1 2 # for example, your domain is domain.
